CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 22, 1956, pg. 1, reads: "Mother of Five Must Live in House With Leaky Roof, Falling Plaster - 'That's Dangerous Ma!' - Little Ervin Brock, one of five small children of Mrs. Shirley Brock, who lives in a condemned house at 424 Grove St., looks at the hole where the plaster fell in their kitchen recently. Neither the Housing Authority, the Redevelopment Authority, nor private real estate agencies can supply the mother, who is on Mothers' Assistance, with any place to move. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Ervin Brock looking up at kitchen wall with missing plaster, in condemned home of Shirley Brock, 424 Grove Street, Hill District
